alert.name: Alert
alert.description: Always on the lookout for danger, you gain the following benefits:
benefits: +5 bonus to initiative
You can't be surprised while you are conscious
Other creatures don't gain advantage on attack rolls against you as a result of being unseen by you

athlete.name: Athlete
athlete.description: You have undergone extensive physical training to gain the following benefits:
benefits: Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1 (max 20)
When prone, standing up uses only 5 feet of movement
Climbing doesn't cost extra movement
You can make a running long jump or high jump after moving only 5 feet

actor.name: Actor
actor.description: Skilled at mimicry and dramatics, you gain the following benefits:
benefits: Increase your Charisma by 1 (max 20)
Advantage on Deception and Performance checks when trying to pass as a different person
You can mimic the speech of another person or the sounds made by other creatures

charger.name: Charger
charger.description: When you use your action to Dash, you can use a bonus action to make one melee weapon attack or shove. If you move at least 10 feet before taking this bonus action, you gain +5 damage on the attack or push 10 feet.
benefits: Bonus action melee attack or shove after Dashing
+5 damage or 10 ft push if you moved at least 10 feet

crossbow_expert.name: Crossbow Expert
crossbow_expert.description: Thanks to extensive practice with the crossbow, you gain the following benefits:
benefits: Ignore the loading quality of crossbows with which you are proficient
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls
When you attack with a one-handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a hand crossbow you are holding

defensive_duelist.name: Defensive Duelist
defensive_duelist.description: When wielding a finesse weapon and another creature hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to your AC, potentially causing the attack to miss.
benefits: Use reaction to add proficiency bonus to AC against one melee attack

dual_wielder.name: Dual Wielder
dual_wielder.description: You master fighting with two weapons, gaining the following benefits:
benefits: +1 bonus to AC while wielding a melee weapon in each hand
You can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed melee weapons
You can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one

dungeon_delver.name: Dungeon Delver
dungeon_delver.description: Alert to hidden traps and secret doors, you gain the following benefits:
benefits: Advantage on Perception and Investigation checks to detect secret doors
Advantage on saving throws against traps
Resistance to trap damage
You can search for traps while traveling at a normal pace

durable.name: Durable
durable.description: Hardy and resilient, you gain the following benefits:
benefits: Increase your Constitution by 1 (max 20)
When you roll a Hit Die to regain hit points, the minimum is twice your Constitution modifier (min 2)

elemental_adept.name: Elemental Adept
elemental_adept.description: Choose one damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Spells you cast ignore resistance to that damage type. When you roll damage for a spell of the chosen type, treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2.
benefits: Spells ignore resistance to chosen damage type
Treat 1s on damage dice as 2s for spells of chosen type
elemental_adept.prerequisites: The ability to cast at least one spell

grappler.name: Grappler
grappler.description: You've developed the skills necessary to hold your own in close-quarters grappling:
benefits: Advantage on attack rolls against creatures you are grappling
You can use your action to try to pin a creature grappled by you (both restrained until grapple ends)

great_weapon_master.name: Great Weapon Master
great_weapon_master.description: You've learned to put the weight of a weapon to your advantage:
benefits: On a critical hit or reducing a creature to 0 HP with a melee weapon, make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action
Before making a melee attack with a heavy weapon, you can take -5 to attack for +10 damage

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: You are an able physician, allowing you to mend wounds quickly:
benefits: Using a healer's kit stabilizes a creature and restores 1 HP
As an action, spend one use of a healer's kit to restore 1d6+4 HP plus additional HP equal to creature's max Hit Dice (once per short/long rest per creature)

heavily_armored.name: Heavily Armored
heavily_armored.description: You have trained to master the use of heavy armor:
benefits: Increase your Strength by 1 (max 20)
You gain proficiency with heavy armor

heavy_armor_master.name: Heavy Armor Master
heavy_armor_master.description: You can use your armor to deflect strikes:
benefits: Increase your Strength by 1 (max 20)
While wearing heavy armor, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons is reduced by 3

inspiring_leader.name: Inspiring Leader
inspiring_leader.description: You can spend 10 minutes inspiring your companions, giving up to 6 creatures temporary HP equal to your level + Charisma modifier.
benefits: 10-minute speech grants temp HP to up to 6 creatures
Temp HP equals your level + Charisma modifier
Creatures can't benefit again until they finish a short or long rest

keen_mind.name: Keen Mind
keen_mind.description: You have a mind that can track time, direction, and detail with uncanny precision:
benefits: Increase your Intelligence by 1 (max 20)
You always know which way is north
You always know the number of hours left before the next sunrise or sunset
You can accurately recall anything you have seen or heard within the past month

lightly_armored.name: Lightly Armored
lightly_armored.description: You have trained to master the use of light armor:
benefits: Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1 (max 20)
You gain proficiency with light armor

linguist.name: Linguist
linguist.description: You have studied languages and codes:
benefits: Increase your Intelligence by 1 (max 20)
You learn three languages of your choice
You can create written ciphers that others can't decipher without a DC 15 Intelligence check

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.description: You have inexplicable luck that seems to kick in at just the right moment:
benefits: You have 3 luck points
Spend one point to roll an additional d20 for an attack, ability check, or saving throw
You can also spend a luck point when an attack is made against you
You regain expended luck points when you finish a long rest

mage_slayer.name: Mage Slayer
mage_slayer.description: You have practiced techniques useful in melee combat against spellcasters:
benefits: When a creature within 5 feet casts a spell, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack
When you damage a creature concentrating on a spell, they have disadvantage on the saving throw
Advantage on saving throws against spells cast by creatures within 5 feet

magic_initiate.name: Magic Initiate
magic_initiate.description: Choose a class: bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard. You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from that class's spell list.
benefits: Learn two cantrips from chosen class
Learn one 1st-level spell from chosen class (cast once per long rest without a slot)

martial_adept.name: Martial Adept
martial_adept.description: You have martial training that allows you to perform special combat maneuvers:
benefits: Learn two maneuvers from the Battle Master archetype
You gain one superiority die (d6)
You regain your superiority die when you finish a short or long rest

medium_armor_master.name: Medium Armor Master
medium_armor_master.description: You have practiced moving in medium armor:
benefits: Wearing medium armor doesn't impose disadvantage on Stealth checks
When wearing medium armor, add up to 3 (instead of 2) from Dexterity to AC

mobile.name: Mobile
mobile.description: You are exceptionally speedy and agile:
benefits: Your speed increases by 10 feet
When you Dash, difficult terrain doesn't cost extra movement
When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn

moderately_armored.name: Moderately Armored
moderately_armored.description: You have trained to master the use of medium armor and shields:
benefits: Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1 (max 20)
You gain proficiency with medium armor and shields

mounted_combatant.name: Mounted Combatant
mounted_combatant.description: You are a dangerous foe to face while mounted:
benefits: Advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures smaller than your mount
You can force an attack targeting your mount to target you instead
If your mount is subjected to an effect that allows a Dex save for half damage, it takes no damage on success and half on failure

observant.name: Observant
observant.description: Quick to notice details of your environment:
benefits: Increase your Intelligence or Wisdom by 1 (max 20)
+5 bonus to passive Perception and passive Investigation
You can read lips if you can see a creature's mouth and it is speaking a language you understand

polearm_master.name: Polearm Master
polearm_master.description: You can keep your enemies at bay with reach weapons:
benefits: When you take the Attack action with a glaive, halberd, quarterstaff, or spear, you can make a bonus action attack with the opposite end (1d4 bludgeoning)
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when they enter your reach

resilient.name: Resilient
resilient.description: Choose one ability score. You become more resilient:
benefits: Increase the chosen ability score by 1 (max 20)
You gain proficiency in saving throws using the chosen ability

ritual_caster.name: Ritual Caster
ritual_caster.description: You have learned a number of spells that you can cast as rituals:
benefits: Acquire a ritual book with two 1st-level ritual spells from a chosen class
You can cast spells in your ritual book as rituals
You can copy other ritual spells into your book

savage_attacker.name: Savage Attacker
savage_attacker.description: Once per turn when you roll damage for a melee weapon attack, you can reroll the weapon's damage dice and use either total.
benefits: Reroll melee weapon damage dice once per turn and use either result

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.description: You have mastered techniques to take advantage of every drop in any enemy's guard:
benefits: Creatures you hit with opportunity attacks have their speed reduced to 0 for the rest of the turn
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from you even if they take the Disengage action
When a creature within 5 feet attacks a target other than you, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.description: You have mastered ranged weapons and can make shots that others find impossible:
benefits: Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage
Ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover
Before making a ranged attack with a proficient weapon, you can take -5 to attack for +10 damage

shield_master.name: Shield Master
shield_master.description: You use shields not just for protection but also for offense:
benefits: If you take the Attack action, you can use a bonus action to shove with your shield
If not incapacitated, add your shield's AC bonus to Dexterity saves against effects that target only you
If subjected to an effect that allows a Dex save for half damage, you can use your reaction to take no damage on success

skilled.name: Skilled
skilled.description: You gain proficiency in any combination of three skills or tools of your choice.
benefits: Gain proficiency in three skills or tools of your choice

skulker.name: Skulker
skulker.description: You are expert at slinking through shadows:
benefits: You can try to hide when lightly obscured
When hiding, missing with a ranged attack doesn't reveal your position
Dim light doesn't impose disadvantage on Perception checks relying on sight

spell_sniper.name: Spell Sniper
spell_sniper.description: You have learned techniques to enhance your attacks with certain kinds of spells:
benefits: Attack roll spells have double range
Ranged spell attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover
You learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll (from bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard list)
spell_sniper.prerequisites: The ability to cast at least one spell

tavern_brawler.name: Tavern Brawler
tavern_brawler.description: Accustomed to rough-and-tumble fighting using whatever is at hand:
benefits: Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1 (max 20)
You are proficient with improvised weapons
Your unarmed strike uses a d4 for damage
When you hit with an unarmed strike or improvised weapon, you can use a bonus action to attempt to grapple

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level when you gain this feat. Whenever you gain a level thereafter, your hit point maximum increases by an additional 2 hit points.
benefits: Hit point maximum increases by twice your level
+2 HP per level gained

war_caster.name: War Caster
war_caster.description: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat:
benefits: Advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on a spell
You can perform somatic components even with weapons or a shield in both hands
When a creature provokes an opportunity attack, you can cast a spell at the creature instead (casting time 1 action, targets only that creature)
war_caster.prerequisites: The ability to cast at least one spell

weapon_master.name: Weapon Master
weapon_master.description: You have practiced extensively with a variety of weapons:
benefits: Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1 (max 20)
You gain proficiency with four weapons of your choice
